title: Sleeping Dogs Definitive Edition RePack by MAXAGENT
description:
======================================
Released: October 10, 2014 
Release date in Russia: October 10, 2014 
Genre: Action (Shooter) / Racing (Cars / Motorcycles) / 3D / 3rd Person 
Developer: United Front Games and Square Enix London Studios 
Publisher: Square Enix Co., LTD. 
Published in Russia: New Disk 
Localization: New Disk 
Publication Type: RePack 
Language text: English / Russian / German / French / Italian / Spanish / Polish 
Language voice: English
Tablet: enclosing "CODEX"
Game Version: v.1.0

======================================
Operating System: Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8 (only X64 !!!) 
Processor: Intel Core2 DUO / AMD Athlon 64 X2 processor with a clock frequency of 2.4 GHz 
Memory: 4 GB (Windows Vista / 7) 
Hard disk space: 20 GB 
Sound device: compatible with DirectX 
Video: DirectX 10 or 11 compatible card, ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT or higher with 512MB graphics memory, Intel HD Graphics 2500 or nizhner

======================================
The Definitive Edition of the critically acclaimed, award winning open-world action adventure, reworked, rebuilt and re-mastered for the new generation. All 24 previously available DLC extensions have been integrated into the game, including the story-extending episode Year of the Snake and the horror-themed Nightmare in North Point. Alongside a wealth of new technological, audio and visual improvements, Hong Kong has never felt so alive. 

A vibrant, neon city teaming with life, Hong KongÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s exotic locations and busy streets and markets hide one of the most powerful and dangerous criminal organizations in the world: the notorious Triads. Play as Wei Shen Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the highly skilled undercover cop trying to take down the Triads from the inside out. You'll have to prove yourself worthy as you fight your way up the organization, taking part in brutal criminal activities without blowing your cover. 

Destroy your opponents in brutal hand-to-hand combat using an unmatched martial arts system. Dominate Hong KongÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s buzzing streets in thrilling illegal street races and tear it up in explosive firearms action. Sleeping DogsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Hong Kong is the ultimate playground.
